product.title: Daito Umbrella Sword
product.description: Description: Fight off the rain! 100% Brand New and High Quality This has to be one of the coolest umbrellas ever! Strong 24 ribs super-windproof and super-waterproof umbrella developed based on samurai Daito sword design. You’re not alone? Fine, the super-large umbrella will handle this. Product Details: Height: 37 inches (94cm) Radius: 20 inches (51cm) Material: Aluminum Alloy Tube and Pongee Control: Semi-automatic
product.descriptionHtml:
Description:

Fight off the rain!

100% Brand New and High Quality

This has to be one of the coolest umbrellas ever!

Strong 24 ribs super-windproof and super-waterproof umbrella developed based on samurai Daito sword design. 

You’re not alone? Fine, the super-large umbrella will handle this.

Product Details:

Height: 37 inches (94cm)

Radius:  20 inches (51cm)

Material: Aluminum Alloy Tube and Pongee

Control: Semi-automatic
